Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Select whether a feature is in the upcoming sprint

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Assign a user story to the sprint backlog

Name: allocate_task_to_worker
Description: Assign a task to a specific worker

Name: set_task_effort
Description: Set estimated effort for a task

Name: choose_team_for_project
Description: Choose a team for a project

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Set priority level for a user story

Name: schedule_daily_scrum_time
Description: Set time of day for daily scrum (hour in 24h)

Name: select_epic_for_roadmap
Description: Decide whether an epic is included in the roadmap

Name: set_scrum_board_wip_limit
Description: Set WIP limit on the scrum board

Name: decide_review_attendees_count
Description: Choose planned attendee count for sprint review

Name: set_velocity_target
Description: Set target average story points per sprint
